Hello, WebGL! Oct 14, 2018

I've decided to start learning WebGL. Why WebGL?

  1. WebGL is a mature, widely-used web standard.
  2. Choosing WebGL over another graphics framework isn't a dead-end; there are most certainly lessons I can take away from my experience when I'm ready to move on.
  3. I can easily share my results on the web.

I usually trust MDN to be an authoritative source on web technologies, so I looked there for some starting material. I found this WebGL tutorial and I've been working through it the hard way, which is to say I'm typing in the code myself, without copy-paste, and making sure it runs correctly. I'm at the point where I've drawn a triangle on the screen (demo).
